column2: content:So, {woman}, are you a fan of baked goods?
content:You a fan of the smell of [wave,2][gradient]freshly baked bread[!gradient][!wave],
content:or do you perfer the pastry section?
content:Humm. <size=80%>It's hard to say.</size>[delay,0.5][!delay] I think that I'm more of a pastry lover.
content:Hello, my name is {waiter}. I'll be assisting you this [gradient]beautiful afternoon[!gradient].
content:I think we need a few more minutes.
content:Yeah, now that you [shake,5]mention it[!shake], something does feel off. [sound,dialogue_2]I can't put my finger on it, though.[!sound]
<size=70%>We've got to stick it out. We're waiting for our guy.</size>
<size=70%>[shake,2]I'm not sure about this.[!shake] That waiter... did he look suspicous?</size>
<size=50%>I'm grabbing [gradient]the briefcase[!gradient]. We can't risk anything.</size>
